reviews.review: I loved this movie.  It is one of the rare ones that delivers all the hype leading up to it.  As a Marvel fan this movie is great and the ending was shocking. Can't wait for the sequel.
The best movie I have ever seen. Waiting for AVENGERS 4
Enjoyed it.  Well paced, action packed with a dash of comedy and tragedy.

Boring.  Comic relief from the Guardians characters is really the only plus point I can go for.  It's just all so tedious, essentially the entire Marvel franchise has just become a soap opera, with each only existing to continue the story from the previous entry and to set it up for the next.  Every one blurring into the next.  No thanks, I'm out.

That's DAMN GOOD writing/acting when you turn the VILLIAN into the ANTI HERO!!! Read the comics and thoroughly HATED Thanos, but after the movie, was like "I get him", and the movie as a whole, Sooo entertaining, roller coaster ride of emotions throughout!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Gotta give it to the Russo brothers and Kevin Feige for crafting such a majestic Marvel movie that is basically the personification of a nerds/comic-book/manga fans ultimate hero movie come true. Never would I have though that this could be a reality and someone actually pulling it off.. And making it work with all these characters in a tight plot structure, if only other franchises *cough* have the brilliance of someone like Kevin Feige... This is basically the finale of all the Marvel movies that came before and totally made for the fans. The fight between Iron man & his group with Thanos was so well made and setup I watched the movie twice just to watch it again (that Dr Strange fight was mind blowing).. The only negatives I can say about the film was a certain plot point involving a planet that wasn't even shown in the film and a unlikely character portrayal involving one of the characters of the GotG, and if youre not a fan you prob would have no idea what is going on haha. Overall, one of the best Avengers/Marvel movies ever.

Excellent Superhero Ensemble movie with an exceptional villain. Have a couple of gripes with it and can't say that i stand by some decisions that the Russo brothers took with the script but this is the best time I've had in a movie theater so far. I was literally at the edge of my seat the entire the time and the ending is very daring!
This movie is like the NFL Pro Bowl or one of those Rock and Roll Hall of Fame All Star Jams -- cool to see lots of talent on the field/stage but absolutely no coherent strategy or theme

I was never a big comic fan and never felt connected to the characters in the movies. However I really liked how the movies were done, and currently we are the point in history when I am thrilled about upcoming Marvel movies, and absolutely disinterested in Star Wars. Infinity Wat will be one of my favourite movies of all time, alongside such titles as Kingdom of Heaven and Lord of the Rings.
